tool_description: Get accurate, reliable, up-to-date TLS certificates across the IPv4 space.
name: certs.io
title: certs.io

api_list.name: searchCertificates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certs-io1.p.rapidapi.com/certificates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certs-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://certs-io1.p.rapidapi.com/certificates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certs-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
